type O
. O

section 13
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/09-02-2020-1601.03362v1.Understanding_and_Control_of_Bipolar_Doping_in_Copper_Nitride.pdf.json
This O

was O
supported O
by O
comparing O

and O

INTRODUCTION O

atoms O
belonging O
to O
different O
layers O
demonstrate O
a O
strong O
modification O
of O
spectra O
calculated O
for O
atoms O
in O
close O
vicinity O
to O
the O
substrate O
. O

section 14
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/18-09-2019-paper-12.pdf.json
The O
changes O
observed O
for O
spin O
- O
down O
states O
at O
the O
Fermi O
energy O
affect O
the O
spin O
polarization O
. O

section 14
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/18-09-2019-paper-12.pdf.json
In O
configurations O
A O
and O
D O
, O
the O
spin O
polarization O
at O
the O
Fermi O
energy O
is O
larger O
than O
the O
bulk O
value O
for O
the O
Fe3Si O
crystal O
. O

section 14
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/18-09-2019-paper-12.pdf.json
This O
supports O
the O
suitability O
of O
the O
Fe3Si/GaAs O
interface O
as O
a O
possible O
building O
block O
in O
heterostructures O
for O
future O
magnetoelectronic O
and O
spintronic O
applications O
. O

section 14
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/18-09-2019-paper-12.pdf.json

effect O
of O
the O
GaAs O
substrate O
on O
the O
lattice O
vibrations O
of O
the O
Fe3Si O
layers O
is O
also O
discussed O
. O

section 14
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/18-09-2019-paper-12.pdf.json
In O
all O
interface O
configurations O
, O
we O
observe O
a O
pronounced O
shift O
to O
lower O
energies O
of O
the O
PDOS O
of O
the O
atoms O
located O
at O
the O
interface O
. O

section 14
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/18-09-2019-paper-12.pdf.json
This O
shift O
is O
especially O
strong O
in O
the O
case O
of O
the O
in O
- O
plane O
vibrations O
. O

section 14
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/18-09-2019-paper-12.pdf.json
In O
further O
layers O
, O
vibrational O
spectra O
are O
similar O
to O
the O
PDOS O
of O
the O
corresponding O
layers O
in O
the O

. O

section 14
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/18-09-2019-paper-12.pdf.json

spectra O

for O

of O

to O

section 14
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/18-09-2019-paper-12.pdf.json

to O

- O

scattering O
geometry O
of O

considered O

the O
in O
- O

. O

section 14
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/18-09-2019-paper-12.pdf.json

the O
measured O
spectrum O
, O
the O
sharp O
peaks O
present O
in O
the O

obtained O
PDOS O
are O

, O

spectra O
cover O
the O

. O

section 14
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/18-09-2019-paper-12.pdf.json

section 14
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/18-09-2019-paper-12.pdf.json

of O

theoretical O
spectra O

the O
contributions O
from O
different O
variants O

section 14
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/18-09-2019-paper-12.pdf.json
The O
best O
agreement O
was O
found O
for O
variant O
C O
, O
which O
reproduces O
the O
low O
- O
energy O
states O
observed O
experimentally O
below O
10 O
meV O
. O
The O
anomalous O
enhancement O
of O
the O
phonon O

energies O
is O
explained O
by O
the O
interface O
- O
specific O
phonon O
modes O
. O

. O

section 4
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/26-08-2019-paper-6.pdf.json

ntype O
semiconductors O
depending O
on O
whether O
or O
not O
nearby O
oxygen O
atoms O
occupy O
surface O
sites O
. O

section 8
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/09-02-2020-1001.2573v1.Stability_and_Electronic_Properties_of_TiO2_Nanostructures_With_and_Without_B_and_N_Doping.pdf.json
This O
suggests O
that O
a O
p O
- O
type O
TiO2 O
semiconductor O
may O
be O
produced O
using O
nitrogen O
doping O
in O

with O
surface O
confinement O

. O

makes O

neutral O

- O
electron O

defect O

for O

. O

similar O
to O

in O

stabilized O

a O

- O

. O

section TITLE
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/26-08-2019-paper-11.pdf.json
Ab O
initio O
study O
of O
thermoelectric O
transport O
properties O
of O
pure O
and O
doped O
quaternary O
compounds O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/26-08-2019-paper-11.pdf.json
Recent O
experiments O
on O
thermoelectric O
characterization O
of O
doped O
quaternary O
compounds O
of O
sattanite O
or O
kesterite O
- O
type O
Cu2ZnSnSe4 O
, O
Cu2ZnSnS4 O
, O
and O
Cu2CdSnSe4 O
, O
show O
promise O
for O
their O
use O
as O
bulk O
thermoelectrics O
. O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/26-08-2019-paper-11.pdf.json
In O
this O
paper O
we O
present O
and O
discuss O
the O
energetic O
, O
electronic O
, O
and O
transport O
properties O
of O
several O
tetrahedrally O
bonded O
quaternary O
compounds O
Cu2QSnX4 B-MATERIAL
, I-MATERIAL
where I-MATERIAL
Q=Zn I-MATERIAL
, I-MATERIAL
Cd I-MATERIAL
; I-MATERIAL
X=S I-MATERIAL
, I-MATERIAL
Se I-MATERIAL
, I-MATERIAL
Te I-MATERIAL
and O
their O
alloyed/doped O
structures O
, O

, O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/01-01-2020-1.pdf.json
This O
study O
describes O
structural O
, O
electronic O
and O
optical O
properties O
of O
MgxCd1-xX B-MATERIAL
( I-MATERIAL
X I-MATERIAL
= I-MATERIAL
S I-MATERIAL
, I-MATERIAL
Se I-MATERIAL
, I-MATERIAL
Te I-MATERIAL
) O
alloys O
in O
the O
complete O
range O
0 O
≤ O
x O
≤ O
1 O
of O
composition O
x O
in O
the O
zinc O
- O
blende O
( O
ZB O
) O
phase O
with O
the O
help O
of O
full O
- O
potential O
linearized O
augmented O
plane O
wave O
plus O
local O
orbitals O
( O
FP O
- O
LAPW+lo O
) O
method O
within O
density O
functional O
theory O
( O
DFT O
) O
. O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/01-01-2020-1.pdf.json
In O
order O
to O
calculate O
total O
energy O
, O
generalized O
gradient O
approximation O
( O
Wu–Cohen O
GGA O
) O
has O
been O
applied O
, O
which O
is O
based O
on O
optimization O
energy O
. O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/01-01-2020-1.pdf.json
For O
electronic O
structure O
calculations O
, O
the O
corresponding O
potential O
is O
being O
optimized O
by O
Engel–Vosko O
GGA O
formalism O
. O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/01-01-2020-1.pdf.json
Our O
calculations O
reveal O
the O
nonlinear O
variation O
of O
lattice O
constant O
and O
bulk O
modulus O
with O
different O
concentration O
for O
the O
end O
binary O
and O
their O
ternary O
alloys O
, O
which O
slightly O
deviates O
from O
Vegard’s O
law O
. O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/01-01-2020-1.pdf.json
The O
calculated O
band O
structures O
show O
a O
direct O
band O
gap O
for O
all O
three O
alloys O
with O
increasing O
order O
in O
the O
complete O
range O
of O
the O
compositional O
parameter O
x O
. O
In O
addition O
, O
we O
have O
discussed O
the O
disorder O
parameter O
( O
gap O
bowing O
) O
and O
concluded O
that O
the O
total O
band O
gap O
bowing O
is O
substantially O
influenced O
by O
the O
chemical O
( O
electronegativity O
) O
contribution O
. O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/01-01-2020-1.pdf.json
The O
calculated O
density O
of O
states O
( O
DOS O
) O
of O
these O
alloys O
is O
discussed O
in O
terms O
of O
contribution O
from O
various O
s O
- O
, O
pand O
d O
- O
states O
of O
the O
constituent O
atoms O
and O
charge O
density O
distributions O
plots O
are O
analyzed O
. O

section ABSTRACT
id data_09-04-2020/fold4/dev/01-01-2020-1.pdf.json
Optical O
properties O
have O
been O
presented O
in O
the O
form O
of O
the O
complex O
dielectric O
function O
ε O
( O
ω O
) O
, O
refractive O
index O
n O
( O
ω O
) O
and O
extinction O
coefficient O
k O
( O
ω O
) O
as O
function O
of O
the O
incident O
photon O
energy O
, O
and O
the O
results O
have O
been O
compared O
with O
existing O
experimental O
data O
and O
other O
theoretical O
calculations O
. O
